about_the_game:
A simple rhythm action game with the simple controls of tapping and holding the keyboard, but what on earth is that above?
Yes, you need to pay attention to those as well!
Can you handle the 8-lane madness?

Enjoy the music of various genres included


Music from various genres awaits with a maximum of 8 unique stages for each tune to play!
More tunes are to come through updates!

Basic 4 lane gameplay and Not-for-faint-hearted 4x2 lane gameplay


Test your rhythm and sight with the intense floor-and-ceiling 4x2-lane gameplay!



Don't worry if it looks daunting; We also offer the basic 4-lane gameplay.



Familiarize yourself with this game mode, and you'll be ready to tackle the 4x2!
An autoplay feature is also available.

Did you say that is too easy?

Challenge yourself with the Risky Play Options, these ones won't go easy on you!

Statistics are your friends!


Analyze your gameplay with in-depth statistics in the Result Screen!


Challenge your friends with your Player Rate, which is calculated from your best scores!

The Unlock System

Playing a song will reward you with "Creds" and "XP."
Collecting XP levels you up, and leveling up sometimes unlocks a new song.
To play the song, you spend the 'Creds' to unlock them on a difficulty-by-difficulty basis!

Whoops, you're out of Creds? How about the Risky Play Options where you bet some of your Creds and play under the risk of getting your gameplay cut short?
Fail and lose the Creds, but complete the stage, and you'll get bigger rewards PLUS a special clear medal!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and 4-key rollover Keyboard ("D, F, J, K" and "E, R, U, I" must be able to be pressed at once) required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphone, Mouse and N-Key Rollover Wired Keyboard is STRONGLY suggested for full experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: 64-bit ONLY. Works on computers with Apple Silicon via Rosetta 2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard required. Apple Keyboards can be used.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina and later
  • Processor: 64-bit ONLY. Works on computers with Apple Silicon via Rosetta 2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphone, Mouse and N-Key Rollover Wired Keyboard is STRONGLY suggested for full experience.

name: Twin Horizons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 64-bit ONLY
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: At least one MUST be present.
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and 4-key rollover Keyboard ("D, F, J, K" and "E, R, U, I" must be able to be pressed at once) required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit ONLY
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Preferrably low-latency ones.
  • Additional Notes: Headphone, Mouse and N-Key Rollover Wired Keyboard is STRONGLY suggested for full experience.

short_description: You may think this is a simple rhythm action game with the simple controls of tapping and holding the keyboard, but what's that above? Yes, you need to pay attention to those as well! Can you handle the 8-lane madness?
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
